MyProject

Class NaiveBayesKnowledgeBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • MyProject.NaiveBayesKnowledgeBase

  • public class NaiveBayesKnowledgeBase
extends java.lang.Object
    The NaiveBayesKnowledgeBase Object stores all the fields that the classifier learns during training.
    See Also:
    http://blog.datumbox.com/developing-a-naive-bayes-text-classifier-in-java/
